column4: Can anyone help? My screen resolution keeps changing to 800x600 when I reboot the computer and it won't change back. I'm using Feisty.
configure your xorg.conf to use only one resolution, but before make a backup of the xorg.conf
did you try to configure your xorg.conf to use only one resolution?
are you using ubuntu,kubuntu, or xubuntu?
did you make that I saw?
ok, type in your terminal as root: gedit /etc/X11/xorg.conf
ok, I would like to see your xorg.conf
I paste it to you in PM?
